title: Adding Items
text: Adding an item to the dictionary is done by using a new index key and assigning a value to it:

title: Update Dictionary
text:
The update() method will update the dictionary with the items from 
a given 
argument. If the item does not exist, the item will be added.
The argument must be a dictionary, or an iterable object with key:value pairs.

Example
Add a color item to the dictionary by using the update() 
method:

thisdict =	{
  "brand": "Ford",
  "model": "Mustang",
  "year": 1964
}thisdict.update({"color": 
  "red"})
Try it Yourself »
